Delilah Williams Pierce (March 3, 1904 - 1992) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe, onye nlekọta na ónyé nkụzi nke bi na Washington, District of Columbia A maara Pierce nke ọma màkà ịkwado nka ndị Africa America na ihe nlereanya ya na ụdị eserese ya, abstraction.
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè Smithsonian Museum of American Art.
Otu ọnwa tupu ọnwụ ya na 1992, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na Mahadum nke District of Columbia, Washington, DC (DHL)
